page.title: 02The Filling Station
page.content: My mum works at an Esso Filling Station at Johnstonebridge on the south bound lane of the A74 which links Glasgow and London.There is also a Filling Station on the north bound lane. The Filling Station on the south bound is open 12 hours per day -8.00am to 8.00pm.On Monday and Wednesday mum works from 2.00pm to 6.00pm and Tuesday, Thursday and Friday she works from 4.00pm to 8.00pm. There are three petrol pumps and one diesel pump.The diesel pump has only been there for about a year.The Filling station has been there for about 25 years.There is also an Esso shop. My mum has had some interesting people in such as Kenny Dalglish, Russ Abbot and Tony Knowles.We have many autographs from these people.
